page.title: 19Media - continued
page.content:
The Voluntary Car Service is now to charge 10p per mile for each person. This is to try to reduce the expenses of the service. Three books by Hunter Davies were reviewed. These were:{Good {Guide to the Lakes, A Walk Around the {Lakes,}and{Land of the Lakes. }Here is a poem from the magazine:
Of all the gay places of public resort {At Brighton or Scarboro,at both or at {court, } There is none like sweet Silloth of which I can boast,{As charming the {sands, so healthy the coast,} Rheumatics, scorbutics and scrofulous kind,{ Hysterics and vapours,disorders {of mind, By bathing and cleansing are made quite anew, {As thousands have proven {and know to be true.
